column2: "I've grasped the approximate geography and situation of this nation."
"This long-lasting civil war... It's possible that the Emperor of Verun is being influenced by Ephimera."
"Simply put, it may be possible to stop the Emperor. Let's go."
"Hey, Guardian, or whatever it was. Did you think you'd get to leave without saying goodbye?"
"If you're going to crush that damned Emperor, then take me with you."
"Allow me to join you as well."
"After all, I'm the one who invited you here. I know this place well, and if the time comes, I can take a hit."
"I don't think they'll listen to us if we refuse. What do you think, <%me>?"
"Then allow us to take the role of your guide and protection."
